body:
archetype (adl_version=1.4; uid=d16bfed4-d9c7-4f9d-87ac-664e8bc13fa7)
	openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.ada_criteria.v0

concept
	[at0000]

language
	original_language = <[ISO_639-1::en]>

description
	original_author = <
		["date"] = <"2024-05-17">
	>
	lifecycle_state = <"unmanaged">
	details = <
		["en"] = <
			language = <[ISO_639-1::en]>
		>
	>
	other_details = <
		["licence"] = <"This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/.">
		["custodian_organisation"] = <"openEHR Foundation">
		["original_namespace"] = <"org.openehr">
		["original_publisher"] = <"openEHR Foundation">
		["custodian_namespace"] = <"org.openehr">
		["build_uid"] = <"f0aed5bf-d18a-3fdd-85bb-542d2ab443c3">
	>

definition
	OBSERVATION[at0000] matches {    -- Ada_criteria
		data matches {
			HISTORY[at0001] matches {    -- History
				events cardinality matches {1..*; unordered} matches {
					EVENT[at0002] occurrences matches {0..*} matches {    -- Any event
						data matches {
							ITEM_TREE[at0003] matches {    -- Tree
								items cardinality matches {0..*; unordered} matches {
									CLUSTER[at0005] occurrences matches {0..1} matches {    -- Ada_criteria
										items cardinality matches {1..*; unordered} matches {
											ELEMENT[at0004] occurrences matches {0..1} matches {    -- Random plasma glucose ≥200 mg/dL (11.1 mmol/L)
												value matches {
													DV_BOOLEAN matches {*}
												}
											}
											ELEMENT[at0010] occurrences matches {0..1} matches {    -- Symptoms of hyperglycemia or hyperglycemic crisis
												value matches {
													DV_BOOLEAN matches {*}
												}
											}
											ELEMENT[at0011] occurrences matches {0..1} matches {    -- 2-hour plasma glucose
												value matches {
													1|[local::at0012],
													2|[local::at0013]
												}
											}
											ELEMENT[at0007] occurrences matches {0..1} matches {    -- HbA1C
												value matches {
													1|[local::at0008],
													2|[local::at0009]
												}
											}
											ELEMENT[at0014] occurrences matches {0..1} matches {    -- Fasting plasma glucose
												value matches {
													1|[local::at0015],
													2|[local::at0016]
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		protocol matches {
			ITEM_TREE[at0006] matches {*}    -- Item tree
		}
	}

ontology
	term_definitions = <
		["en"] = <
			items = <
				["at0000"] = <
					text = <"Ada_criteria">
					description = <"Ada_criteria">
				>
				["at0001"] = <
					text = <"History">
					description = <"@ internal @">
				>
				["at0002"] = <
					text = <"Any event">
					description = <"@ internal @">
				>
				["at0003"] = <
					text = <"Tree">
					description = <"@ internal @">
				>
				["at0004"] = <
					text = <"Random plasma glucose ≥200 mg/dL (11.1 mmol/L)">
					description = <"Random plasma glucose ≥200 mg/dL (11.1 mmol/L).">
				>
				["at0005"] = <
					text = <"Ada_criteria">
					description = <"">
				>
				["at0006"] = <
					text = <"Item tree">
					description = <"@ internal @">
				>
				["at0007"] = <
					text = <"HbA1C">
					description = <"1. A1C ≥6.5%. The test should be performed in a laboratory using a method that is NGSP certified and standardized to the DCCT assay, In the absence of unequivocal hyperglycemia, diagnosis requires 2 abnormal test results from the same sample or in 2 separate test samples.">
				>
				["at0008"] = <
					text = <"≥6.5%">
					description = <"HbA1C ≥6.5%">
				>
				["at0009"] = <
					text = <"<6.5%">
					description = <"HbA1C <6.5%">
				>
				["at0010"] = <
					text = <"Symptoms of hyperglycemia or hyperglycemic crisis">
					description = <"In a patient with classic symptoms of hyperglycemia or hyperglycemic crisis">
				>
				["at0011"] = <
					text = <"2-hour plasma glucose">
					description = <"2-hour plasma glucose ≥200 mg/dL (11.1 mmol/L) during an OGTT. The test should be performed as described by the World Health Organization, using a glucose load containing the equivalent of 75 g anhydrous glucose dissolved in water.">
				>
				["at0012"] = <
					text = <"≥200 mg/dL (11.1 mmol/L)">
					description = <"during an OGTT (oral glucose tolerance test). The test should be performed as described by the World Health Organization, using a glucose load containing the equivalent of 75 g anhydrous glucose dissolved in water.">
				>
				["at0013"] = <
					text = <"<200 mg/dL (11.1 mmol/L)">
					description = <"during an OGTT (oral glucose tolerance test). The test should be performed as described by the World Health Organization, using a glucose load containing the equivalent of 75 g anhydrous glucose dissolved in water.">
				>
				["at0014"] = <
					text = <"Fasting plasma glucose">
					description = <" FPG ≥126 mg/dL (7 mmol/L). Fasting is defined as no caloric intake for at least 8 hours.">
				>
				["at0015"] = <
					text = <"≥126 mg/dL (7 mmol/L)">
					description = <"Fasting plasma glucose In the absence of unequivocal hyperglycemia, diagnosis requires 2 abnormal test results from the same sample or in 2 separate test samples.">
				>
				["at0016"] = <
					text = <"<126 mg/dL (7 mmol/L)">
					description = <"Fasting plasma glucose In the absence of unequivocal hyperglycemia, diagnosis requires 2 abnormal test results from the same sample or in 2 separate test samples.">
				>
			>
		>
	>
description: American Diabetes Association criteria for the diagnosis of diabetes
